commonIssues.solution: Ensure proper prop types and React.FC usage. Check tsconfig.json includes React types.
Use React DevTools Profiler and apply memoization strategies. Run /optimize command.
Use React Testing Library's renderHook and proper async testing patterns.
Consider useReducer for complex state or external libraries like Zustand.
